EmailTemplate.name: Salesforce Release Notes
EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce Sales Cloud - Dobby Sock Release Update with Notes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Salesforce Dobby Sock Release was successfully implemented this evening and Salesforce is back to normal. Release highlights are listed below. For more detailed information on these updates and enhancements, speak to your team's Salesforce SME or review the sprint stories in JIRA.
Account:
JENGA-1654: Enrollment Communication Input Form - Phase II JENGA-1591: Health Score Integration (Ready to launch on 12/21)
Opportunity:
JENGA-1667: New Opportunity Type "Price - Increase" JENGA-1664: Remove ability to close for CI and Ops JENGA-1665: Updates to Oppty Close Checklist JENGA-1668: Opportunity Close notification on Contract Path Change Type Opportunities JENGA-1675: SalesOps: New Field on Opportunity "Commision Notes"
Taskray:
JENGA-1504: SPA TaskRay Redesign Improvements
Questions? Send message to crmrequest@livongo.com
Thank you!!
